verses.text: And it came to pass, when \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* had \w established|strong="H3559"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and had \w strengthened|strong="H2393"\w* himself, he \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him.

And it came to pass, \add that\add* in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, because they had \w transgressed|strong="H4603"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

With twelve \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add were\add* without \w number|strong="H4557"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with him out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; the \w Lubims|strong="H3864"\w*, the \w Sukkiims|strong="H5525"\w*, and the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w fenced|strong="H4694"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which \add pertained\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* to \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, and \add to\add* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that were gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Ye have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and therefore have I \w also|strong="H0637"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* you in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w*.

Whereupon the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* themselves; and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

And when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that they \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* themselves, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* came to \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, They have \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* themselves; \add therefore\add* I will not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* them, but I will \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* them \w some|strong="H4592"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H6413"\w*; and my \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* shall not be poured \w out|strong="H5413"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w*.  +  r 12.7  t some: or, a little while *

Nevertheless they shall be his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; that they may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* my \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, and the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

So \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all: he carried \w away|strong="H3947"\w* also the \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

Instead of which \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and \w committed|strong="H6485"\w* \add them\add* to the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w*, that \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w when|strong="H1767"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w fetched|strong="H5375"\w* them, and brought them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* \w chamber|strong="H8372"\w*.

And when he \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* himself, the \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* from him, that he would not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \add him\add* \w altogether|strong="H3617"\w*: and also in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* went \w well|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 12.12 \ft and also…: or, and yet in Judah there were good things\f*

¶ So \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* himself in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*: for \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w seventeen|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Naamah|strong="H5279"\w* an \w Ammonitess|strong="H5985"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, because he \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* not his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.14 \ft prepared: or, fixed\f*

Now the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and of \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w* the \w seer|strong="H2374"\w* concerning \w genealogies|strong="H3187"\w*? And \add there were\add* \w wars|strong="H4421"\w* between \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* and \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w continually|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 12.15 \ft book: Heb. words\f*

And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 12.16 \ft Abijah: also called, Abijam\f*
